Search & check by event Modern CCTV system requires AI technology. Search & check by event Main Features Our product is designated to cover all your needs of a modern AI camera system. AI-integrated Video Analytics AI-powered video analytics for real-time insights, object detection, movement tracking, and alerts. Enhances security and operational efficiency with automated monitoring. Real-Time Camera Monitoring Monitor camera feeds in real-time for immediate insights and responses. Enhance security and operational efficiency with continuous live monitoring. Camera Liveview and Multiplexing View multiple camera feeds simultaneously with liveview and multiplexing. Improve situational awareness and streamline monitoring with efficient feed management. PTZ Camera Control Control PTZ (Pan-Tilt-Zoom) cameras remotely for comprehensive surveillance. Adjust camera angles and zoom levels to focus on specific areas and enhance monitoring. Video Recording and Playback Record and playback video footage for detailed review and analysis. Ensure comprehensive documentation and easy access to past events for security and operational purposes. GIS-based Camera Management Manage and monitor cameras using GIS (Geographic Information System) for spatial awareness. Enhance surveillance with location-based camera control and visualization.
